-- Button Barcode

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DISTINCT HYPB_BATCHNO FROM :1/HYPB, :1/HUSR WHERE :2 (HYPB_SCANNED = 'N' or HYPB_SCANNED = 'P') ORDER BY HYPB_BATCHNO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: Reset lineno as soon as cursor parks on Batch id of this task to get
-If button pressed form this task : call scan with Batch ID only
-If button pressed from detail task : call scan with Batch ID and lineno
-- Error in case of invalid v.User
-- Error in case of invalid v.Office
-- Error in case of invalid v.DocType
-- Error in case of invalid v.Department
... in case of no errors, perform screen refresh according to the filter
criterias
-- Delete batchnumber
-- Simple screen to modify some HYPB fields, without any validations

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{0,2}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,8}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,9}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,10}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,11}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,12}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,13}'VAR)

Text.val: -- Validations (no validations possible, because scannings have to be done also
removed clients / debtors from the system)
-- Save
-- Get highest Line-No.
-- Virtual Work-Field
-- Count HYPB-Rows
-- Count = max. HYPB_LINENO

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM :1/HYPB WHERE HYPB_BATCHNO = :2 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
